casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.N.R., Minor Child.
appealed by Petitioners Mary Margaret J. and Brandon J. No. 368P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Terry F. Rose, Smithfield, for Margaret and Brandon J. Susan J. Hall, for Father. Peter Wood, for Mother. W.A. Holland, Smithfield, Jennifer S. O'Connor, for Johnston County DSS. James Johnson, for Guardian ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of July 2006 by Petitioners (Mary Margaret J. and Brandon J.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
